channel.title: Blurrs client changing the colours of bg!
channel.description:
ok i have download a leeched verion of blurrs client and i was wondering if i can change the background bit
e.g the theme/colour of client w/e
from white to red detailed reply would be helpfull!

item.title: Blurrs client changing the colours of bg!
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

He means, the Jframe. Try checking out your GUI. Most Bluur clients do have multiple colors.

Read full topic
item.source: Blurrs client changing the colours of bg!

item.title: Blurrs client changing the colours of bg!
item.dc:creator: @samrofl samrofl
item.description:
@samrofl wrote:

yeah theres a folder called “sprites” where you can change backround and the login box etc.

Read full topic
